snippet: President Obama’s proposed remedies only underscore how much he is at the mercy of actors in Europe, China and Congress whose political interests often conflict with his own.
abstract: President Obama’s proposed remedies for the weak economy only underscore how much he is at the mercy of actors in Europe, China and Congress whose political interests often conflict with his own; he has had little success influencing Congress or allies abroad.

byline.original: By JACKIE CALMES and NICHOLAS KULISH
byline.contributor: Jackie Calmes reported from Washington, and Nicholas Kulish from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: President Obama’s proposed remedies only underscore how much he is at the mercy of actors in Europe, China and Congress whose political interests often conflict with his own.

headline.seo: Obama’s Hands Tied on Weak Economy
headline.main: Weak Economy Points to Obama’s Constraints
headline.print_headline: Weak Economy Points To Obama’s Constraints
